direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate input strings against regular expressions but return different types of results.
Both methods process input strings against regular expressions with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods involve compiling and using regular expressions, though compile is part of the Pattern class.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of regular expression patterns.
isValid method can be used to validate input before calling validate to ensure proper setup.
Both methods handle similar exceptions and can be used to verify the results of validate.
